pages.title: Bull Shark
pages.text: It is known for its aggressive nature, and presence in warm, shallow brackish and freshwater systems including estuaries and rivers.$(br2)Bull sharks can thrive in both salt and fresh water and can travel far up rivers.

pages.title: Bull Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 7 Days
